name: district_detail_of_specific_division
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bdapi.
Tool description: BD API is a RestAPI service. Divisions, Districts, Upazilla, Coordinates, etc of Bangladesh are available in Bangla and English within endpoints. Main Documentation website: https://bdapis.com/
API description: `/v1.0/division/{division_name}`
Get all Districts and Upazila of any Division.

**Response:**
```
status: object,
data: [
  _id: string:district,
  district: string,
  upazilla: array
]
```

division_name.description: The name of the division for which to retrieve district and upazila information.
